page.title: 12Williton Hospital
page.content: The staff at{Williton Hospital } are properly trained for{elderly } people.People in the wards are mainly local but some come from different parts of {West Somerset.} There is an old man called Billy and he has been in Williton Hospital eversince he was a boy.But before the Hospital was built he was in the {workhouse.} The Hospital was a{Victorian {Workhouse}and is A listed building so it cant be pulled down. this makes modern nursing very difficult.The workhouse was built in 1838 and was taken over by the{National Health}in 1948 after the war. In the hospital there are nursing staff,physiotherapist,occupational therapist, domestic staff, kitchen staff, gardeners, and volunteers. Usually there are six nurses per ward.
